title: New: BLK JKS – Zol!
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/BLK-JKS-Zol.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/BLK-JKS-Zol.jpg)

South African rock band **BLK JKS** are to release a new EP just in time for the World Cup, entitled **Zol!**. With the title track **BLK JKS** step away from their usual psychedelic guitar riffs and frenetic drum solos, to produce a summery and upbeat pop song, about soccer… With “I can roll and shoot at the same time” infectiously being proclaimed over some funky bass, a distinctive african rhythm and a sun drenched guitar riff, the song fits perfectly as a soundtrack the excitement and anticipation for the World Cup in South Africa.

![Zol!](http://www.secretlycanadian.com/thumbs/SC217.jpg)

On the 10th July the band will perform alongside Alicia Keys, Amadou & Mariam, Black Eyed Peas, John Legend, Shakira, Tinariwen and others as part of the **FIFA World Cup Kick Off Celebration** at Orlando Stadium in Soweto, South Africa. The 5 track EP will be released 8th July on _Secretly Canadian_.

[Zol!(mp3)](http://thefader.cachefly.net/blk-jks-zol.mp3)
